document_data.name: Chapel of the Valiant
document_data.mainbody: The '''Chapel of the Valiant''' was a room in [[Castle Obarskyr]].
document_data.History: In the aftermath of the massacre during the [[Council of the Dragon]] in late [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, the bodies of several lords, including [[Jassur Dragonwood]], Lord [[Ambrival (Lord)|Ambrival]], [[Obraerl Foulweather]], [[Montror Barelder]], [[Lyrannus Tantorn]], Lord [[Hardivyper (Lord)|Hardivyper]], Lord [[Ravenhill (Lord)|Ravenhill]], and Lord [[Briarbroke (Lord)|Briarbroke]], were taken to the Chapel of the Valiant and identified. Per [[Glathra Barcantle]]'s orders, there were three [[War Wizards]] she wanted to have them studied by before any priests or kin were allowed access.
